heading: HB07038
0: AN ACT ALLOWING THE AUTHORIZATION OF ALTERATIONS AND/OR ERASURES IN CHECKS THROUGH COUNTER-SIGNATURE OR COUNTER-INITIAL, THEREBY OVERTURNING THE PERTINENT ITEM GUIDELINES  OF MEMORANDUM CIRCULAR NO. 15-460 OF THE PHILIPPINE CLEARING HOUSE CORPORATION (PCHC) WHICH DECLARED CHECKS AND POST-DATED CHECKS WITH ERASURES AND ALTERATIONS AS INELIGIBLE AND UNACCEPTABLE FOR CLEARING
status: Pending with the Committee on BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES since 2018-01-31

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07038
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ALLOWING THE AUTHORIZATION OF ALTERATIONS AND/OR ERASURES IN CHECKS THROUGH COUNTER-SIGNATURE OR COUNTER-INITIAL, THEREBY OVERTURNING THE PERTINENT ITEM GUIDELINES OF MEMORANDUM CIRCULAR NO. 15-460 OF THE PHILIPPINE CLEARING HOUSE CORPORATION (PCHC) WHICH DECLARED CHECKS AND POST-DATED CHECKS WITH ERASURES AND ALTERATIONS AS INELIGIBLE AND UNACCEPTABLE FOR CLEARING
